font.p:
This is a search engine to search for code phrases C codes. I developed this search engine as part of my job interview with Aspiring Minds (June, 2014). Given a database of codes, this search engine builds a database of reverse indices of all the 'code phrases' found in the DB to the particular indices of the programs using a neat hash function. This work is based on this paper titled "Codewebs: Scalable Homework Search for Massive Open Online Programming Courses", Andy Nguyen et al.
The code for this project can be found here.
